comment_text: I got my wife a Motorola Edge 40 Pro. She is very happy with the pictures. Especially at night, she got better pictures than iPhones and Samsung phones. She adores the Motorola shortcuts and gestures. Also, she's a businesswoman and the 125W fast charging is absolute awesome. When you plug the charger in it looks like it's counting random numbers, not charging :)) .

comment_text: I see in this days a lot of people speak about the camera. Much more than anything. look at the whole phone that it presents, not just at a camera that you can always replace with a much better performing one from a DSLR or mirrorless. a good camera on a smartphone really matters, but still, you can't judge a phone just from this point of view. the camera offered by the Edge 40 Pro is a good one. On the video side, it behaves really well, very good stabilization. Overall 165Hz, 125w charging, OLED display, IP68, Dolby Atmos, Dolby vision, I think it offers a good price-quality ratio.
